message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.AI 

Reasoning: The paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) techniques to infer relationships between nations from news articles. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with NLP and related topics. The paper also involves information retrieval (IR) techniques to extract relevant information from news articles, which makes cs.IR (Information Retrieval) another likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a new automatic evaluation metric, which involves machine learning techniques and falls under the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper uses unsupervised neural models, which falls under the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper also involves analyzing regional differences in news coverage, which could fall under the sub-category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
